sentences.en: A single spark can start a prairie fire.
A Utah prairie dog emerges to forage in spring snow.
sentences.cn: 犹他州的一只草原土拨鼠顶着春雪出来觅食.

sentences.en: About 160 species of rare birds live in the swamps and prairie there.
sentences.cn: 大约有160种珍稀鸟类栖息在这里的沼泽地和大草原上。

sentences.en: And lightning or downed power lines spark this prairie fire.
sentences.cn: 闪电或者是倒下的电缆线引起了这次燎原大火.

sentences.en: Andrew traversed the prairie on horseback.
sentences.cn: 安德鲁骑马穿越大草原.

sentences.en: Because a prairie is wide therefore debauchery is admirable.
sentences.cn: 因为草原辽阔,所以放荡值得钦佩.

sentences.en: Did you visit the Prairie provinces?
sentences.cn: 你们到平原三省去了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Flames and smoke billowed over the prairie.
From your English garden variety to your prairie wildflower, floral prints tell a sweet story.
sentences.cn: 从英式花园的百花齐放到大草原的野花儿，印花叙述着甜美的故事。

sentences.en: He farmed 2500 acres of Nebraska prairie.
sentences.cn: 他耕种了2500英亩的内布拉斯加州大草原.

sentences.en: His hooves were galloping, thunder in that prairie grass.
sentences.cn: 它四蹄翻飞, 蹄声犹如奔雷响彻在大草原上.

sentences.en: How many an afternoon antinia and i have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence .
sentences.cn: 有多少个下午，我同安东妮亚在大草原上这种壮丽的景色中慢慢地走着啊！

sentences.en: How many an afternoon Antinia and I have trailed along the prairie under the magnificence.
sentences.cn: 有多少个下午,我同安东妮亚在大草原上这种壮丽的景色中慢慢地走着啊!

sentences.en: Indians hunted the prairie for buffalo.
sentences.cn: 印第安人在北美大草原上捕猎野牛.

sentences.en: She wanted to run , fleeing from the encroaching prairie, demanding the security of a great city.
sentences.cn: 她想逃离这个咄咄逼人的大草原, 到大城市找个栖身之地.

sentences.en: The pictures depicting the life of the prairie people are simple but touching.
sentences.cn: 这些描绘草原人民生活的画面都很素朴动人.

sentences.en: The thin defence line now fell back, and the girls swept forward like a prairie - fire.
sentences.cn: 厂门里那单薄的防线往后退了.冲厂的女工们火一样的向前卷去.

sentences.en: The vast prairie stretches west to the horizon.
sentences.cn: 茫茫大草原向西伸展,直至天边.

sentences.en: To assemble a prairie takes time -- even if you have all the pieces.
sentences.cn: 整合一个大草原需要时间——哪怕你手中已掌握了所有分块。

trans.tran_en: a wide open area of fairly flat land in North America which is covered in grass or wheat
